description: Weather conditions, seasons, and climate vocabulary

sentences.explanation: 'Il fait beau' = it's nice weather. 'Aujourd'hui' = today.
'Il pleut' = it's raining (impersonal verb). 'Beaucoup' = a lot.
'L'hiver' = winter (masculine). 'Froid' = cold (masculine adjective).
'Le vent' = wind (masculine). 'Fort' = strong (masculine adjective).
'Les fleurs du printemps' = spring flowers. 'Du' = de + le (contraction).
'Il neige' = it snows. 'En décembre' = in December (months use 'en').
'L'été' = summer (masculine). 'Très chaud' = very hot. Intensifier + adjective.
'Le ciel' = sky (masculine). 'Nuageux' = cloudy (masculine adjective).
'Avoir besoin de' = to need. 'Un parapluie' = umbrella (masculine).
'Les feuilles d'automne' = autumn leaves. 'Belles' (feminine plural adjective).
'Il y a du brouillard' = it's foggy. 'Ce matin' = this morning.
'La température est de' = the temperature is. Numbers with temperature.

'Préférer' = to prefer. 'Le temps chaud' = warm weather.
'Jouer dans' = to play in. 'La neige' = snow (feminine).
'L'arc-en-ciel' = rainbow. 'Après' = after. Weather phenomena sequence.

'Il fait chaud' = it's hot. 'En été' = in summer.
'Les nuages' = clouds. 'Gris' = gray (invariable color).
'Il va pleuvoir' = it's going to rain (near future). 'Demain' = tomorrow.
'Apporter' = to bring. 'Des fleurs' = flowers (indefinite plural).
'Souffler' = to blow (wind). 'Fort' = hard/strongly.
